query.query: {"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":"{{column(product_dimension_dropdown.selection, [\"value\"]).asObject()}}","filters":[["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asObject()}}"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current_compact\"]).asObject()}}"],["ForecastCategoryName","{{column(ForecastCategoryName_Toggle.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_total', \"Closed Won\" as 'Forecast Group'; b = load \"opportunity4\"; b = filter b by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; b = filter b by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_total', \"Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; d = group a by all full, b by all; d = foreach d generate (case when coalesce({{cell(hidden_quota.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\").asString()}}, 0) - (coalesce(sum(a['sum_total']), 0) + coalesce(sum(b['sum_total']), 0)) > 0 then coalesce({{cell(hidden_quota.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\").asString()}}, 0) - (coalesce(sum(a['sum_total']), 0) + coalesce(sum(b['sum_total']), 0)) else 0 end) as 'sum_total', \"Remaining After Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; z = union a, b, d; fake = load \"opportunity4\"; fake = group fake by all; fake1 = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_total', \"Closed Won\" as 'Forecast Group'; fake2 = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_total', \"Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; fake3 = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_total', \"Remaining After Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; final = union z, fake1, fake2, fake3; final = group final by 'Forecast Group'; final = foreach final generate 'Forecast Group' as 'Forecast Group', sum('sum_total') as 'sum_total';","measures":[["sum","total"]],"groups":["Forecast Group"]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["ForecastCategoryName"],"filters":[["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asObject()}}"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current_compact\"]).asObject()}}"]]}

{"measures":[["count","*"]],"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'ForecastCategory' == \"Forecast\"; a = group a by 'ForecastCategoryName'; a = foreach a generate 'ForecastCategoryName'; b = load \"opportunity4\"; b = filter b by 'ForecastCategory' != \"Forecast\" && 'ForecastCategory' != \"Closed\"; b = group b by 'ForecastCategoryName'; b = foreach b generate 'ForecastCategoryName'; c = union a, b;","groups":["ForecastCategoryName"]}
{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Owner.Role.RoleNames"],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"b = load \"quota4\"; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; c = group b by all; c = foreach c generate coalesce(sum('QuotaAmount'), 0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount';","measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = load \"quota4\"; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate (case when coalesce(sum(b['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) > 0 then round(coalesce(sum(b['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 2), 0) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_remaining';","measures":[["sum","quota_remaining"]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_total', \"Closed Won\" as 'Forecast Group'; b = load \"opportunity4\"; b = filter b by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; b = filter b by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_total', \"Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; z = union a, b; fake = load \"user_role4\"; fake = group fake by all; fake1 = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_total', \"Closed Won\" as 'Forecast Group'; fake2 = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_total', \"Forecast\" as 'Forecast Group'; final = union z, fake1, fake2; final = group final by 'Forecast Group'; final = foreach final generate 'Forecast Group' as 'Forecast Group', sum('sum_total') as 'sum_total';","measures":[["sum","total"]],"groups":["Forecast Group"]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount';","measures":[["sum","Amount"]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by {{cell(metric_dropdown.selection, 0, \"filter\").asObject()}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; u = load \"user_role4\"; u = filter u by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"RoleNames\")}}; z = group u by 'DeveloperName' left, a by 'Owner.Role.RoleNames'; z = foreach z generate u['DeveloperName'] as 'DeveloperName', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) as 'sum_Amount', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']) / unique(a['Id']), 0) as 'avg_Amount', coalesce(unique(a['Id']), 0) as 'unique_Id'; z = order z by '{{cell(metric_dropdown.selection, 0, \"projection\").asString()}}' {{cell(metric_dropdown.selection, 0, \"order\").asString()}} nulls last; z = limit z 100;","measures":"{{cell(metric_dropdown.selection, 0, \"compact\").asObject()}}","groups":["DeveloperName"]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":"{{column(type_dimension_dropdown.selection, [\"value\"]).asObject()}}","filters":[["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asObject()}}"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current_compact\"]).asObject()}}"],["ForecastCategoryName","{{column(ForecastCategoryName_Toggle.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = load \"quota4\"; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate (case when sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']) > 0 then round(sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']), 2) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_attainment';","measures":[["sum","quota_attainment"]]}

{"facet_filters":[],"measures":[["sum","pipe_coverage"]],"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity4\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; a = filter a by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = load \"quota4\"; b = filter b by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate (case when coalesce(sum(b['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) > 0 then round(coalesce(sum(b['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 2), 0) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_remaining'; d = load \"opportunity4\"; d = filter d by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; d = filter d by {{column(dropdown_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; d = filter d by {{column(dropdown_RecordType.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; d = filter d by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; d = filter d by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; d = filter d by {{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; d = filter d by {{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; e = group c by all full, d by all; e = foreach e generate coalesce(sum(d['Amount']), 0) as 'amount', sum(c['sum_quota_remaining']) as 'remaining_quota'; e = foreach e generate round(coalesce(sum('amount') / sum('remaining_quota'), 0), 1) as 'sum_pipe_coverage';","order":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":"{{column(owner_dimension_dropdown.selection, [\"value\"]).asObject()}}","filters":[["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(Id_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(roles_rolled_up.selection, [\"DeveloperName\"]).asObject()}}"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current_compact\"]).asObject()}}"],["ForecastCategoryName","{{column(ForecastCategoryName_Toggle.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}
